name: Disco Dice
description:
Disco Dice a fancy Disco/CyberPunk Themed Run ‘N Gun Game where you play as a fair dice , tasked to battle against endless waves of unfair dice!

This is a game of Skill and Tanique where a solid understanding of the mechanics helps the player to ACE the game. We hope you enjoy the Rage Disco Experience!

Background Music :

Cyberpunk Gaming Electro | STARDUST by Alex-Productions | https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCx0_M61F81Nfb-BRXE-SeVA

Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
